name: Wanderers (phantogast)
description:
A short story with quick battles! Wander around, fight monsters, drink beer, make a friend.

Developed for the 1-bit game jam. Special thanks to Jio Butler and Claude TC for helping me out when I was in need! I'm dead!

Story was inspired by "You only realize the value of something when it's gone." Not sure I stuck to it though.

Will update this later! Have fun! :D
